title: pretty sure i broke my 1 key.. awesome.
body:
so i have big hands and use 1234 as qwer.. playing karthus on arurf and spamming 1..im pretty sure weakened the connection or something. so now when i use pyke or xerath and hold q i have to retap it to use it or it doesnt even work at all and im stuck in the animation. the only champ i have a lot of fun with i can no longer use :/ man this game is killing me every god damn turn i take. i finally start having fun again and this shit happens.. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}


edit: holy shit it isnt me. its the game! just looked into the report a bug and many others are having the issue! PHEW.
